Package de.hshn.mi.pdbg

Interface PersistentObject

All Known Subinterfaces:
HospitalStay, Patient, Person, Ward
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractPersistentObject
public interface PersistentObject
PersistentObject represents the basic interface for all objects in the PDBG framework that shall be persisted (within a persistent store).

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final long
    INVALID_OBJECT_ID
    Indicates an invalid object ID.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    long
    getObjectID()
    Uniquely identifies a persistent object of the given class in the persistent store.
    boolean
    isPersistent()
    Indicates whether a representation of this object exists in the persistent store or not.

  • Field Details

    • INVALID_OBJECT_ID

      static final long INVALID_OBJECT_ID
      Indicates an invalid object ID. This value indicates that an instance of PersistentObject is not yet persisted. Valid object IDs for PersistentObject instances must be greater than zero.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

  • Method Details

    • getObjectID

      long getObjectID()
      Uniquely identifies a persistent object of the given class in the persistent store.
      Returns:
      The primary key associated with an object. It is '0' if the object is not persistent, else positive otherwise.

    • isPersistent

      boolean isPersistent()
      Indicates whether a representation of this object exists in the persistent store or not.
      Returns:
      true if a persistent representation exists, false otherwise.
